detail_view.task_title: Sensor Replacement Reminder for Marcus Thompson

ai_insight.summary: Marcus Thompson, a 45-year-old male with Type 1 Diabetes and hypoglycemia unawareness, experienced two hypoglycemic events recently, with the latest on 2025-11-20 at 2:15 AM, indicating potential issues with nocturnal glucose control. His CGM (FreeStyle Libre 3) is nearing the end of its sensor life on day 10, which may affect glucose monitoring accuracy and management.

suggested_messages.message: Marcus Thompson's CGM sensor is on day 10; replacement reminder sent. Considering recent hypoglycemic events, review sensor data for accuracy issues and follow up on hypoglycemia management strategies.
